articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Art Squad of KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Art Squad of KPA Unit
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a performance given by the art squad of KPA Unit 10215 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Among the audience were senior party and army officials Kim Jong Un, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Yong Chun, Choe Thae Bok, Hong Sok Hyong, Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk and Kim Chang Sop, servicepersons of the KPA and officials in the fields of literature, arts and media.
					
					 Members of the art squad staged colorful numbers of various genres. They included mixed quartet and chorus "Song of Happiness", poem recital "Leader and April 15", female solo "Our Unforgettable Leader", flute and female chorus "The Party Is Care of General", guitar ensemble and female solo "For My Only Motherland", sketch "Issue of Impression", bass guitar solo "Reunification Train Runs", poem and story-telling "Our Lifeline" and chorus "Green Pine Standing on Nam Hill".
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of the great national pride and self-confidence of the Korean people being blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation and the invincible might of the heroic KPA which has grown to be a first line-death-defying corps defending the leader and a matchless army under the care of the brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu. They, at the same time, successfully represented the firm faith and will of the KPA to devotedly defend the gains of the revolution won by President Kim Il Sung, true to the experienced and seasoned leadership of the WPK.
					
					 Through the performance replete with revolutionary enthusiasm and militant spirit they powerfully demonstrated the might of the army artistes creditably performing their sacred mission as buglers in the Songun era by instilling the ardent love for the Party and the leader and the country and its people into the servicepersons.
					
					 Kim Jong Il expressed great satisfaction over the unique and militant performance truthfully representing the servicepersons' inexhaustible mental power they staged with works of great cognitive and educational values. He highly appreciated their success in the presentation and extended thanks to them.
					
					 Performing activities are of weighty significance in the ideological education of the soldiers, he said, advancing important tasks to serve as guidelines for intensifying the revolutionary and militant performing activities.
					
					 Noting that exceptionally high is the enthusiasm of the army and people of the DPRK dashing ahead like the wind toward an invincible power with a grand ambition, he expressed expectation and belief that the whole party and army and all the people would bring about great innovations and leap forward on all fronts by dynamically waging an all-out offensive and an all-out campaign for a breakthrough to realize the President's desire to build a thriving nation and thus commemorate the centenary of birth of the President as the greatest holiday of Kim Il Sung's nation and as a great auspicious event in the human history.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Il from Russian President
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Il from Russian President 
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a message from Russian President D. Medvedev on Friday on the occasion of the 99th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The message says:
					
					 Respected Your Excellency Kim Jong Il, please accept my sincere congratulations to you on the occasion of the national holiday, the 99th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the DPRK.
					
					 Russia highly appreciates the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by multifariously developing the friendly relations between the two countries which have deep historical roots and tradition. 
					
					 It is my belief that the mutual understanding reached between the two sides recently for steadily developing the bilateral cooperation would be embodied in the specific work to contribute to boosting the cooperation between Russia and the DPRK and ensuring peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia. 
					
					 Please accept my wishes for your success in the work for the welfare of your people.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreign Guests
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreign Guests 
						
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had talks with foreign guests who took part in the consultative meeting of senior officials of the international preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday. 
					 They are former Deputy President of the Senate of Nigeria Ibrahim Mantu, Chairman of the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association Yousef Al Amiri and Chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association Anders Kristensen, who are co-chairmen of the international preparatory committee, secretaries of the international preparatory committee Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, and Javed Ansari, secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, Raymond Ferguson, national secretary of the Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Culture who is vice-chairman of the Asia-Pacific regional preparatory committee, C.P. Mainali, general secretary of the C.C., the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) who is chairman of the Nepalese national preparatory committee, Sumiko Shimizu, representative of the Japanese Women's Society for Solidarity with the Korean Women who is chairwoman of the Japanese preparatory committee, and Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain who is chairman of the KFA preparatory committee. 
					
					 Ibrahim Mantu expressed the will to make effort to significantly commemorate the centenary of birth of the President as a great international festival. 
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would achieve successes in the efforts to build a thriving nation and achieve the reunification of the country true to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Japanese Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Japanese Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with a Japanese delegation for Japan-Korea friendship and cultural exchange led by Ekan Ikeguchi, high priest of the Saifukuji-temple, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

articles.title: Talks between Delegations of Security Organs of DPRK and Vietnam
articles.content:
Talks between Delegations of Security Organs of DPRK and Vietnam
						
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Talks were held here on Friday between the delegations of the Ministry of People's Security of the DPRK and the Ministry of Public Security of Vietnam.
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were members of the delegation of the Ministry of People's Security headed by Minister Ri Myong Su and from the Vietnamese side members of the delegation of the Ministry of Public Security headed by Minister Le Hong Anh, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam, and Nguyen Dinh Duong, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Vietnamese embassy here.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the matter of boosting exchange and cooperation between the securities organs of the two countries and issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
						
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on April 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were Zheng Wantong, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Liu Jieyi, deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, a vice-minister of Railways, Wu Donghe, chairman of the Sino-Korea Friendship Association, Liu Zhenmin, assistant to the foreign minister, and officials concerned.
					
					 On hand were Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China, and staff members of the embassy.
					
					 Ji Jae Ryong said in his speech at the reception that Kim Il Sung led the anti-Japanese war and the Fatherland Liberation War to victory, demonstrating the dignity and honor of the nation before the whole world, performed the immortal exploits in the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence and provided deep and strong historic roots of the DPRK-China friendship.
					
					He stressed that General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited China twice last year, putting the traditional DPRK-China friendly relations on a new higher level. He reiterated the will to make all efforts to boost the DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 Zheng Wantong praised the President for performing undying exploits before the times and history, expressing belief that the Korean people would significantly commemorate the centenary of his birth as the greatest holiday.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the Sino-DPRK relations have entered a new phase of development under the deep care of the top leaders of the two parties and countries in recent years, he added that China would join the Korean comrades in the efforts to ensure that the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship would steadily develop and go down in history generation after generation.
					
					 Meanwhile, a reception was given by the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang on April 12.

articles.title: Russian Personages Visit DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Russian Personages Visit DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Russian personages visited the DPRK embassy in Moscow on April 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included Umalatova, chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, Khristenko, secretary of the Central Committee of the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks, Yazov, former defence minister of the Soviet Union, Yeliseev, chief of the Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior, Ovsyannikov, head and chief conductor of the Orchestra of the 21st Century of Russia, Koltsova, head of the State Academy Beryozka Dancing Troupe of Russia Named after N. S. Nadezhdina.
					
					They laid bouquets before the full-length painting of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Delegations and Delegates of Organizations for Study of Juche Idea Feted
articles.content:
Delegations and Delegates of Organizations for Study of Juche Idea  Feted
						
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government Friday gave a reception in honor of the delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, the delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea from different countries and regions on visits to the DPRK.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea, and officials concerned.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, addressing the reception, said that the history of Kim Il Sung in which he performed distinguished exploits in the human history through his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and revolutionary practice would shine forever.
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the Juche idea, the Songun idea founded by the President are shedding their rays, he stressed.
					
					 Vishwanath said in his speech that the President devoted his whole life to the cause for the prosperity and well-being of the Korean people and progressive people and provided mankind with the great Juche idea.
					
					 Kim Il Sung was a great thinker and theoretician and outstanding statesman who turned the DPRK into a power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence, he stressed.

articles.title: Participants in 27th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Feted
articles.content:
Participants in April Spring Friendship Art Festival Feted
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly Friday gave a reception in honor of the participants in the 27th April Spring Friendship Art Festival at the People's Palace of Culture on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were artistes of foreign countries and overseas Korean artistes participating in the festival.
					
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kang Nung Su, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Minister of Culture An Tong Chun, chairman of the organizing committee of the festival, vice-chairmen of the organizing committee of the festival and officials concerned. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Friendly Amusement Games of Participants in Art Festival Held
articles.content:
Friendly Amusement Games of Participants in Art Festival Held
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Friendly amusement games of the participants in the 27th April Spring Friendship Art Festival were held at the Rungrado Recreation Ground on Friday.
					 The recreation ground was animated with artistes from different countries of the world and those of overseas Koreans.
					
					 The participants, divided into the teams of Mt. Kumgang and Mt. Myohyang, had merry games. They included running with a touch on a balloon, crossing a stone bridge, two persons' running with a ball between their heads, a tug of war.
					
					 They also enjoyed diverse performances given by acrobats and children of the DPRK.

articles.title: Participants in Art Festival Enjoy Performance Given by Samjiyon Band
articles.content:
Participants in Art Festival Enjoy Performance Given by Samjiyon Band
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 27th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Friday enjoyed a performance given by the Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe at the East Pyongyang Grand Theater on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The artistes of the band presented mixed duet "Sing, Fork to Mangyongdae", female duet "The Country of the Leader", male solo "Thee the Road of Songun Tell," female solo "I Sing of the Party," music "Jovial Dance Music," male quartet "Song of Roast Chestnuts" and other numbers.
					
					 They also presented foreign music "Vienna Concerto" and violin solo "Song of Gypsy". 
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Acrobatic Performance Goes On in Art Festival
articles.content:
Acrobatic Performance Goes On in Art Festival
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Korean, Chinese and Russian acrobats are performing at the Moranbong Circus Theater in Pyongyang as part of the 27th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					Chinese acrobats perform "Duet Ballet Etude" and "Bowl Piling".  
					
					 "Duet Ballet Etude" won the Prize of the President of the Republic in the 2010 Italian International Acrobatic Festival and "Bowl Piling" performed by thirteen persons took a gold prize in the 2004 Monte Carlo International Acrobatic Festival.
					
					 The stunts are enthusiastically acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 Russians from the State Acrobatic Company and the Nikulin Moscow Circus are also enjoying popularity.
					
					 An international concours winner performs physical acrobatics "Standing on End" to win an ovation from the audience for her amazing plastic feats.
					
					 "Seesaw Play" also receives warm applause. It won prizes in the 2004 Wuqiao International Acrobatics Festival in China and other acrobatic festivals.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
						
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials, commanding officers of the Korean People's Army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions Friday visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on the occasion of the Day of the Sun to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung.
					 Laid before the statue of the President was a floral basket in the joint name of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the DPRK National Defence Commission, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 The participants paid high tribute to the President, looking up to his statue.
					
					 They paid homage in humble reverence to the President who performed the great immortal feats before the era, the revolution, the country and its people through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and great revolutionary practices. 
					
					 Anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, service persons of the Korean People's Army and working people from all walks of life also visited the memorial palace on the same day. 
					
					 Homage was also paid by the diplomatic corps and the military attaches corps here, Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations of various countries and regions, foreign personages who participated in the consultative meeting of senior officials of the international preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of the President, the delegation of the Vietnamese Ministry of Public Security, the delegation of Koreans in Japan, foreign guests and overseas compatriots.

articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Visit Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions Friday visited Mangyongdae on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They looked round the historic relics preserved with care at the house where the President was born and grew up, nurturing his noble will for revolution.
					
					 They had a photo taken before the house.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung
						
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons, working people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and laid floral baskets before them Friday, his birth anniversary.
					 Servicepersons, working people and school youth and children here visited the statue of the President on Mansu Hill and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Seen standing there was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Laid before the statue were floral baskets in the name of party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and  national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Interior Forces, organs at various levels, industrial establishments, farms and schools here and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the President, looking up to his statue.
					
					 Floral baskets were placed before the statues of the President at different units here.
					
					 Servicepersons, working people and school youth and children in different parts of the country laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues of the President in their residential areas.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
						
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in different places on Friday, the 99th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Dancing parties started at the plazas of the Party Founding Memorial Tower, the April 25 House of Culture and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and other venues of the dancing parties here to the tune of song "Let's Sing of the Day of the Sun." 
					
					 The participants presented dances with the pride of holding in high esteem the President, the father of socialist Korea and pioneer of the cause of building a thriving nation of Juche, as the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 Youth and students danced to the tune of songs "Mangyongdae, the Cradle of Revolution" and "Mine is the Eternal Country of the Leader".
					
					The festive atmosphere picked up when the band played "Our General Is Best" and "Our Country Is Witnessing Changes" and other songs in reflection of boundless reverence for General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Similar dancing parties were also held in various provincial seats and cities to significantly commemorate the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: First Camping Starts at Children's Camps
articles.content:
First Camping Starts at Children's Camps 
						
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Camping started at the children's camps across the country this year on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The camping brought together members of the Korean Children's Union who set an example in study and organizational life.
					
					 A meeting to receive campers was held at the Mangyongdae Children's Camp Friday.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, teachers of the camp and campers.
					
					 At the meeting the reporter and speakers underlined the need for the campers to earnestly learn from the glorious childhood of the peerlessly great persons, train their body and mind, consolidate what they have learned at schools and thus prepare themselves as reliable pillars of Songun Korea.
					
					 Similar meetings took place at the Songdowon International Children's Camp, the Yonphungho and other children's camps across the country.
					
					 The campers spent the first pleasant day while playing colorful sports and amusement games and having cultural programs.

articles.title: Performance Given at Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace
articles.content:
Performance Given at Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the art group members of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Friday to commemorate the 99th birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the C.C., the youth league, officials of the league and school youth and children here.
					
					 The performers represented the warm hearts of the school children across the country running towards Mangyongdae, the cradle of revolution in numbers including "Mangyongdae which looks like a flower garden" and "Beautiful Mangyongdae".
					
					 Its repertoire included chorus "Glory to Father Marshal" and female chorus "Let's Sing of River Taedong" impressively reflecting the boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung who rose as the sun of Juche and provided an eternal cradle for the happiness of all generations to come.
					
					They successfully depicted the appearance of the school children firmly preparing themselves as the successors to the revolution who would shoulder upon themselves the future of the sun's Korea under the care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: April Holiday Significantly Commemorated across Country
articles.content:
April Holiday Significantly Commemorated across Country
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was commemorated with splendor in all parts of the country.
					 Officials of organs at various levels, working people, school youth and children Friday visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace to pay homage to the President in humble reverence.
					
					 Floral baskets, bouquets and flowers were laid before the statues of the President in different parts of the country.
					
					 People from all walks of life, school youth and children went round the historic relics preserved at the birthplace of the President in Mangyongdae where he was born and spent his childhood, nurturing the noble intention of revolution.
					
					 The venue of the 13th Kimilsungia Festival in Pyongyang and Kimilsungia shows in provinces drew an endless stream of visitors.
					
					 Art performances were given in different places on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 Provincial artistes put on the stages female quartet "Song of Mangyondae", female solo "His Eternal Smile", female solos and choruses "We Will Always Live with the Leader" and "Our Leader Will Always Be with Us" and other numbers.
					
					 A remembrance meeting for commemorating the Day of the Sun titled "Land of South Phyongan Province Sings of the Leader" was held in Phyongsong, a performance of working people and students commemorating the Day of the Sun "Our Leader" in Chongjin, a music and dance performance was given by students and women's union members in Wonsan and chorus "Song of Women's Union Members to the Day of the Sun" in Kanggye.
					
					 Conspicuous was mass gymnastic display "Land of Ryanggang Province Blooming under Care of the General" presented by 20,000 school youth and children and women's union members in Hyesan.
					
					 Waltz of young people was given and pleasant sports and amusement games took place in different parts of the country.
					
					 Okryu, Chongryu, Sinhung and Kyongam restaurants and other public catering networks served holiday dishes. Recreation grounds were crowded with holiday-makers.

articles.title: Stands Begin Serving Ice Water
articles.content:
Stands Begin Serving Ice Water 
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Stands set up in different places here started serving ice water on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The festively decorated stands in Chollima, Ponghwa, Yonggwang, Chongnyon and other streets are busy serving citizens with ice water.
					
					 Its variety includes red bean, strawberry and tomato ice water.

articles.title: April 15 Children's Flower Garden
articles.content:
April 15 Children's Flower Garden
						
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The April 15 Children's Flower Garden built in April Juche 81 (1992) is located at the foot of Mt. Song in Mangyongdae District, Pyongyang.
					 Many schoolchildren enjoy themselves, getting general knowledge of plants. 
					
					 Various species of flowers are growing in the garden with ponds, waterfalls, pavilions and sculptures of figures and animals. 
					
					The garden contains a fountain covering more than 7,000 square meters, an exhibition, international children's friendship hall and greenhouse.
					
					 Growing in the international children's friendship hall are many flowering plants sent from other countries. 
					
					Kim Kyong Dok, manager of the garden, told KCNA that President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il planted trees there together with schoolchildren on April 13, Juche 80 (1991).

articles.title: Life Devoted to People
articles.content:
Life Devoted to People
						
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Greeting the Day of the Sun (April 15), the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, the Korean people are recollecting the life of the President, who devoted his all to the people with the "believing in the people as in Heaven" as his lifelong motto.
					 He, with ardent love for the people, successfully guided the 20-year-long anti-Japanese struggle and the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953).
					
					The total distance of the field guidance tour he made in his lifetime extends to 578,000 km, or fourteen and half rounds of the globe.
					
					 Many people, including servicemen and children, are visiting the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill to pay tribute to him.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter from AINDF
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter from AINDF
						
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Thanks to April 15, the birth anniversary of the President, it was possible for the Korean nation to put an end to the checkered history of sufferings, greet a new morning of independent dignity and prosperity, and brilliantly adorn the complicated 20th century as a glorious century of Kim Il Sung, steering the era of independence in the centre of the earth, the letter said, and continued:
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche started by Kim Il Sung in Mt. Paektu has successfully been carried forward by you.
					
					 You have brought about miracles and changes in all fields of the building of a thriving nation, frustrating all sorts of moves of the imperialist allied forces including the U.S. imperialists with his matchless Songun politics. As a result, the ideal and desire of the President are being translated into a reality in the north.
					
					 The daily increasing position and influence of Songun Korea on the international community are the precious fruition of your distinguished political caliber and wise leadership over the era of independence.
					
					 The vanguard fighters and patriotic people of various circles in the south will put further spurs to the struggle for implementing the joint declarations under the banner of "By our nation itself" and thus bring about a new phase of independent reunification without fail this year, the letter concluded.

articles.title: Letter from Chongryon
articles.content:
Letter from Chongryon
						
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Friday received a letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The President was the savior and benevolent father of the Koreans in Japan as he brought them the joy of being members of the liberated nation, the dignity and honor of being legitimate citizens of Juche Korea and provided them with the pride of being vanguard in the overseas compatriots' movement and a worthy life by founding Chongryon, the letter said, and continued:
					
					 It is thanks to you that the homeland is bringing about a decisive turn in building a thriving socialist nation, looking down at the world after emerging a single-mindedly united politico-ideological power, a military power possessed of tremendous war deterrence and a scientific and technological power breaking through latest science and technology. 
					
					 The hearts of the Koreans in Japan are filled with the unshakable faith that a shining victory is in store for Chongryon's patriotic cause only when they carry forward generation after generation the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu under your leadership, eternally holding the President in high esteem for all ages as the sun of the nation as befitting his descendants.
					
					 The compatriots in Japan will make tangible contributions to the improvement of the standard of the people's living, agricultural production and scientific and technological development in the homeland and join in the nation-wide struggle to bring about a turning phase of national reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself". We will also conduct positive external activities to contribute to improving the DPRK-Japan relations and promoting the friendship between the two peoples.

articles.title: Papers Editorially Commemorate Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Papers Editorially Commemorate Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung 
						
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Newspapers Friday dedicate editorials dealing with the undying exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for the people to his birth anniversary. 
					 Rodong Sinmun says: Kim Il Sung was the peerlessly great man who devoted everything to the happiness of the people all his life with the noblest view on the people which no one in the world could ever possess. 
					
					 The Juche idea founded by the President is the immortal guiding idea showing the popular masses the true way to always triumph and the socialist cause of Juche started by him is the most just cause of bringing the ideal and happiness of the people into bloom in all aspects.
					
					 The President's founding of the Juche idea was the quintessence of his noble ideal of valuing the people. It was the cherished view of the President that fully reflecting the desire and wishes of the people would amount to a great idea and revolutionary line. The ideas and theories enunciated by him became an invincible banner for the Korean revolution enjoying absolute support from the people because he always mixed himself with the people and valued their will. 
					
					 The great wisdom and energies devoted by the President to carrying out the socialist cause of Juche find their manifestation in that he made sure the Workers' Party of Korea and the state consistently pursued the politics based on love and trust, benevolent politics and led the officials to implement the revolutionary mass line and embody the spirit of devoted service to the people. 
					
					 It is the real picture of Korean-style socialism under which it is the starting point and the supreme principle of the party and state activities to improve the standard of people's living and everything is oriented and subordinated to bringing happiness to the people. 
					
					The noble intention and cause of the President are being successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and they are becoming brilliant realities.
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all the people to unite close around the Central Committee of the WPK headed by Kim Jong Il and work hard to accomplish the cause of building a thriving socialist nation and the revolutionary cause of Juche started by the President.

articles.title: Choson Sinbo Carries Special Write-up
articles.content:
Choson Sinbo Carries Special Write-up 
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Choson Sinbo, an organ of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, carried a special write-up on April 13 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The paper carried on its front page a portrait of smiling President and on its second and third pages photos on the revolutionary feats the President performed by dedicating himself to the happiness of the people and the prosperity of the country all his life and wisely leading Chongryon.
					
					 The paper edited an article under the title "The Day of the Sun pervaded with the pledge of loyalty-Boundless is the honor of being descendants of the President."
					
					 The article conveyed accounts of the 13th Kimilsungia Festival, the 27th April Spring Friendship Art Festival and other significant commemorations now under way in Pyongyang on the occasion of the 99th birth anniversary of the President.
					
					 The article stressed that everything intended and desired by the President is becoming a reality thanks to the all-out drive being waged for building a thriving nation true to the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Praised in S. Korea
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Praised in S. Korea
						
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Articles praising President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il are extensively posted on Internet homepages in south Korea.
					 Such articles posted on Internet homepages recently had "Accounts of Conversations during President Kim Il Sung's Receptions", "President Kim Il Sung's Idea of Believing in People as in Heaven and Succession to It" and "What Is the Thriving Nation as I Saw It?" and other titles. 
					
					 Also posted there are articles dealing with the advantages of the socialist system in the DPRK centered on the popular masses.

articles.title: Revolutionary Exploits of Kim Jong Il Praised
articles.content:
Revolutionary Exploits of Kim Jong Il Praised
						
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- International and regional organizations posted special write-ups on their Internet homepages on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain on April 1 posted a portrait of Kim Jong Il and an article titled "Invincible Military Power and Kim Jong Il" on its  Internet homepage "One Corea Network".
					
					 The homepage said in the article that Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the NDC of the DPRK provided a sure guarantee for the DPRK's demonstration of its might as an invincible military power.
					
					 The article referred to the facts that Kim Jong Il has trained the Korean People's Army as an army strong in ideology and faith through his ceaseless field inspection, brought astonishing events demonstrating the great unity of the army and people to the country and turned the whole country into an impregnable fortress by establishing the traits of attaching importance to the military affairs.
					
					 The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions posted photos of Kim Jong Il on his revolutionary activities and an article titled "Great Turn Brought by the Extraordinary Leadership" on its Internet homepage on April 7.
					
					 The article noted that precious structures helpful to improving the standard of people's living are being built one after another in the DPRK under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Days Observed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Days Observed Abroad
						
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries between April 1 and 4 on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the 79th anniversary of the founding of the Korean People's Army.
					 They included a lecture and film show in Nepal, lecture, photo exhibition and film show in Mongolia, film show in the Czech Republic and an opening ceremony of a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition in Brazil.
					
					 On display in the venues of the events were works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos showing their revolutionary exploits and books and photos introducing the building of a thriving nation in the DPRK and its handicrafts.
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched Korean films "Country Shedding Its Rays Thanks to the Army of Mt. Paektu" and "Pyongyang at Night".
					
					 The chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics praised Kim Il Sung as the father of socialist Korea, distinguished thinker and theoretician and outstanding leader.
					
					 The executive chairperson of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development said that the DPRK remained undeterred even when socialism was frustrated in the Eastern European countries in the closing years of the last century as it successfully built Korean-style socialism based on the Juche idea.
					
					 The mayor of Campinas City, Sao Paulo State, Brazil referred to the fact that all popular policies including free medical care and free education are enforced in the DPRK and the Korean people have achieved astonishing successes in various fields.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at an event held in Nepal.

articles.title: DPRK's Greatest Holiday Observed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Greatest Holiday Observed Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries between April 4 and 7 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included meetings in Bangladesh and Laos, a remembrance meeting in Cambodia, lecture and photo exhibition in Sri Lanka and meeting and seminar on exploits in France.
					
					Displayed in the venue of the photo exhibition were photos showing the immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present at the events were personages of political parties, organizations and organizations for the study of the Juche idea and masses of the above-said countries.
					
					 Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers’ Party of Bangladesh, Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, and other speakers highly praised Kim Il Sung for clearly indicating the road to be followed by humankind and making an immortal contribution to the cause of global independence with his outstanding and experienced leadership.
					
					 The executive secretary of the Funcinpec Party of Cambodia and the international secretary of the Central Committee of the French Revolutionary Communist League said that Kim Il Sung was a great leader recognized not only by the Korean people but by progressive mankind and a symbol of victory and glory as he greatly encouraged the world anti-imperialist independent forces.
					
					 Tong Yeu Tho, chairman of the Laos-Korea Friendship Association, stressed in his speech that it would always support the Korean people in their struggle for reunifying the country in line with the proposals set forth by the President.
					
					 Edmond Jouve, director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, noted that the cause of Songun started by the President has successfully been carried forward by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Bangladesh.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Italy
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Uphold Independence" was published in pamphlet by the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy and the Italian Committee for the Study of Songun Idea for Independence and Sovereignty.
					 The work, published on Sept. 7, Juche 70 (1981), clarifies that it is required by the present era to maintain independence in party and state activities and the Juche idea is a man-centered philosophy.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje del presidente ruso
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje del presidente ruso
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibió un mensaje que le enviara el Presidente de la Federación Rusa, Dmitri Medvedev, con motivo del 99º aniversario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					La misiva señala:
					
					Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il
					
					En ocasión de la fiesta nacional coreana, 99º aniversario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, fundador de la República Popular Democrática de Corea, le envío a Vd. mis sinceras felicitaciones.
					
					Rusia aprecia mucho la contribución del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien desarrolló multilateralmente las relaciones de amistad entre nuestros dos países con profundas raíces históricas y tradiciones.
					
					Estoy seguro de que la comprensión mutua lograda recientemente para el desarrollo constante de la cooperación bilateral se concretará en los trabajos reales y contribuirá así a intensificar la cooperación Rusia-RPDC y a preservar la paz y la seguridad de la Península Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiático. 
					
					Le deseo éxitos en sus trabajos para el bienestar de su pueblo.

articles.title: Periódicos capitalinos conmemoran día de natalicio de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Periódicos capitalinos conmemoran día de natalicio de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ATCC) -- Los periódicos capitalinos insertaron en sus ediciones de este viernes sendos editoriales dedicados al día de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					  El Presidente es el gran hombre sin igual quien dedicó todo lo suyo a la felicidad del pueblo durante toda su vida partiendo de su noble concepción del pueblo, la cual no tuvo nadie, señala el diario Rodong Sinmun y prosigue:
					
					  La idea Juche creada por el Presidente es la directriz que ilumina el camino de victoria eterna de las masas populares y la causa socialista del Juche iniciada por él es la más justa que materializa totalmente el ideal y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					  La creación de la idea Juche fue el fruto de su noble ideal de conceder mayor importancia al pueblo.
					
					  Si se sintetizan las aspiraciones y demandas de las masas populares, se puede concebir una gran idea y línea revolucionaria. Esto fue el credo del Presidente.
					
					  Las ideas y teorías, presentadas por él compenetrándose siempre con las masas populares y apreciando la opinión de ellas, constituyeron siempre la bandera de victorias de la revolución coreana contando con apoyo absoluto de ellas.
					
					  El Presidente se dedicó por entero al cumplimiento de la causa socialista del Juche.
					
					  Especialmente, condujo al partido y al Estado a practicar invariablemente la política de amor, confianza y beneficios populares y a los funcionarios a cumplir la línea revolucionaria de masas trabajando con el espíritu de servir abnegadamente al pueblo.
					
					  Hoy en día, el mejoramiento de las condiciones de la vida del pueblo resulta el punto de partida de las actividades del partido y el Estado y su máximo principio y lo todo se orienta a incrementar la felicidad del pueblo. He aquí el aspecto verdadero del socialismo al estilo coreano.
					
					  El noble propósito y la causa del Presidente continúan firmemente y se cumplen hoy en esta tierra gracias al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  A su vez, el periódico Minju Joson exhortó a todos a luchar con dinamismo por llevar a feliz término la causa de construcción de la gran potencia próspera socialista y la revolucionaria del Juche, iniciadas por el Presidente, uniéndose con más firmeza en torno al Comité Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea encabezado por el Dirigente.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre delegaciones de Corea y Vietnam
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre delegaciones de Corea y Vietnam
						
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el día 15 en esta capital las conversaciones entre la delegación del Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo de la República Popular Democrática de Corea y la del Ministerio de Seguridad Pública de Vietnam.
					En la ocasión participaron por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegación del MINSEP presidida por su ministro Ri Myong Su y por la vietnamita, los miembros de la delegación de la entidad homóloga encabezada por su ministro Le Hong Anh, miembro del Buró Político del Comité Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam, y el encargado vietnamita de negocios a.i. en Corea, Nguyen Dinh Duong.
					
					Ambas partes intercambiaron criterios sobre el problema de desarrollar el intercambio y la cooperación entre los órganos de seguridad de los dos países y otros asuntos de interés mutuo.

articles.title: En Corea festejan el Día del Sol
articles.content:
En Corea festejan el Día del Sol
						
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ATCC) -- En todas las localidades del país, tuvieron lugar las celebraciones del Día del Sol (15 de abril, cumpleaños del Presidente Kim Il Sung).
					Este día, los funcionarios de organismos a todos los niveles, los trabajadores, los jóvenes y niños escolares rindieron homenaje al Presidente en el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan.
					
					Se colocaron cestos, ramos y ramitas de flores ante las estatuas de bronce del Presidente erguidas en distintas localidades del país. 
					
					Los trabajadores de distintos estratos, los jóvenes y niños escolares recorrieron la casa natal del Presidente en Mangyondae, donde él nació y pasó su infancia forjando su gran propósito revolucionario. 
					
					Visitaron muchos habitantes la sede del 13º Festival de Kimilsungias y las exposiciones provinciales de la misma flor.
					
					Además, se ofrecieron las funciones artísticas por esa fiesta nacional. 
					
					En las escenas se pusieron diversas piezas como el cuarteto femenino "Canción de Mangyongdae", el solo femenino "Su sonrisa eterna", el solo femenino y coro "Viviremos eternamente junto con el Líder", "El Líder vive siempre en nosotros", etc.
					
					Tuvieron lugar el encuentro de recordación del Día del Sol "La tierra de Phyongnam entona la canción del Líder", la escena para el Día del Sol de los trabajadores y niños escolares "Nuestro Líder", la función de música y danza de los estudiantes y las miembros de la Unión de Mujeres Democráticas de Corea (UMDC) y la función de coro "Canción de gremiales de la UMDC dedicada al Día del Sol" en las ciudades de Phyongsong, Chongjin, Wonsan y Kanggye, por ese orden.
					
					  Se efectuó la gimnasia masiva "La tierra de Ryanggang que prospera gracias al General" en que actuaron 20 mil jóvenes y niños escolares y las miembros de la UMDC de la ciudad de Hyesan.
					
					  En diferentes partes del país, se realizaron los bailes de los jóvenes y los juegos deportivos y de recreo.
					
					  En las bases de servicio gastronómico como los Restaurantes Okryu, Chongryu, Sinhung y Kyong-am se expendieron los alimentos de fiesta mientras en los lugares de descanso cultural hubo los encuentros de diversiones de los trabajadores.
